document_data.name: Force Ladder
document_data.mainbody: '''''Force ladder''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created a [[ladder]] of pure force. It was nearly invisible and had the dimensions of a regular ladder, {{SI|2|ft}} is width and could be between {{SI|10|ft}} and {{SI|60|ft}} in length. It was light, only weighing {{SI|1|lb}}, but could support up to {{SI|100|lb|k}} or more. The amount of weight that the ladder could support was determined by the caster's skill level. It can be used as both a barrier and a weapon against ethereal and incorporeal creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[spell focus|focus]], a small ladder crafted from [[silver]].
